sentences.en: At this age, you should be able to subtract one fraction from another.
sentences.cn: 在你这个年龄，你应该会演算分数减法了。

sentences.en: I got these shoes at a fraction of the original price
sentences.cn: 我以原价的一个零头买到了这双鞋子。

sentences.en: I got these shoes at a fraction of the original price.
sentences.cn: 我以原价的一个零头买到了这双鞋子。

sentences.en: I opened my eyes just a fraction.
sentences.cn: 我微微睁开了眼睛。

sentences.en: I'll be ready in a fraction of a second.
sentences.cn: 我马上就好.

sentences.en: If a stranger stops you, just wind the window down a fraction.
sentences.cn: 如果有陌生人拦你的车，把车窗摇下一点点就行。

sentences.en: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering a numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result.
sentences.cn: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数。

sentences.en: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result!
sentences.cn: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数！

sentences.en: It needed only a fraction of a second to behead him.
sentences.cn: 砍去他的脑袋只要短短的一瞬.

sentences.en: It was apparently more tenaciously held to surface than fraction three.
sentences.cn: 它比级分三更顽强地保持在表面上.

sentences.en: Naturally, only a fraction of our huge investment was ever make public.
sentences.cn: 自然, 我们巨额的投资中只有一小部分是公之于众的.

sentences.en: Only a fraction of the A ions are in tetrahedral sites.
sentences.cn: 只有一部分A离子处在四面体的位置上.

sentences.en: Only a small fraction of a bank's total deposits will be withdrawn at any one time.
sentences.cn: 任何时候，一家银行的总存款只有少量会被提取。

sentences.en: She hesitated for a fraction of a second before responding.
sentences.cn: 她在回答之前犹豫了一下。

sentences.en: The albumin fraction of plasma protein is of the greatest significance.
sentences.cn: 血浆蛋白的白蛋白部分意义最大.

sentences.en: The car missed me by a fraction of an inch.
sentences.cn: 那车子差一点儿就要撞到我了.

sentences.en: The cost is only a fraction of his salary.
sentences.cn: 那项费用不过是他薪水的一小部分.

sentences.en: The fraction was then multiplied by 100 and rounded to the nearest half or whole number.
sentences.cn: 然后，分数被乘以100，取整为最接近的半数或整数。

sentences.en: The students had a grasp of decimals, percentages and fractions.
sentences.cn: 学生们掌握了小数、百分数和分数。

sentences.en: The value of a fraction is inversely proportional to that of the denominator.
sentences.cn: 分数值与分母值成反比例.

sentences.en: This is called the partial fraction expansion of p / q.
sentences.cn: 这叫做p/q的部分分式展开式.

words.tran_cn: 部分的；[数] 分数的，小数的

phrases.tran_cn: 一小部分；一部分；零点几
[工业管理]不合格率；废品率；不良率
n. 克分子分数；摩尔分数
粒级；颗粒组；粒度级份额
[口语]完全地；地地道道地；百分之百地
空隙率；空隙分数；空隙组分
体积分率，体积分数；容积率
重量百分率；重量分率；重量分数

trans.tran_cn: [数]分数，一小部分，些微，不相连的一块，片段，[化]分馏
trans.tran_en: a part of a whole number in mathematics, such as ½ or ¾
